description:
Taiki asks Makoto to appear on a cooking show with him. Usagi decides to tag along, but her clumsiness creates a huge mess at the TV studio.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Friend or Foe? Star Lights and the Sailor Guardians
Teki? Mikata? Star Lights to Sailor Senshi
¿Enemigos? ¿Aliados? Las Guerreros y las Star Lights.
敵? 味方? スリーライツとS戦士
